metadata.title: CVE-2023-47996 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability in Exif.cpp::jpeg_read_exif_dir inFreeImage 3.18.0 allows attackers to obtain information and cause a denialof service.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
